    • Method Detail

      • readData

        public void readData(DataSource source)
        Reads raw survey data and computes the mean privacy risk scores. The survey data appears in a comma seperated values (csv) file with a header row, and at least three column headers: risk, infotype and willingness-, which is the willingness to share response value ordered from 1 to 8 where 1 is extremely willing, and 8 is extremely unwilling. The risk levels should be written as: "only 1 person in your X", where X is equal to one of family, workplace, city, state or country.
        Parameters:
        source - the raw survey data

      • getMaxScore

        public PrivacyRiskScore getMaxScore(PrivacyRiskTarget target)
        Returns the maximum mean willingness to share across all respondents.
        Specified by:
        getMaxScore in class PrivacyRiskCalculator
        Parameters:
        target - describes the information types to score
        Returns:
        the mean privacy risk score
